settings.heading: INVITE ONLY PRE-ORDERS
settings.text:
phone (1) is Nothing. Everything we stand for.

As our first smartphone, supply will be limited. We want our community to be amongst the first to experience it. Get priority access to order phone (1) before it goes on sale. By invite only.

Register to get on the waitlist for an invite. When you get the invite, it guarantees your spot to order phone (1) from 12 July, and unlocks an exclusive reward.

settings.heading: STEP 1: Secure phone (1)
settings.text:
From 24 June, private community members will get the invitation code without waiting. Everyone else can get on the waitlist for an invite code. View your position in your Account. Refer friends to move up the queue.

When you get the invite code by email to use within 48 hours. Come back here and click on ‘I have an invite’ and enter it. Secure your place with a non-refundable £20 deposit. You’ll also get an extra £20 credit for a phone (1) accessory for when you confirm your order.

This guarantees you’ll be able to pre-order phone (1), but it’s not the actual order itself. Think of it as securing your place.

settings.heading: STEP 2: Confirm Order on 12 July
settings.text:
On 12 July, you’ll be emailed a private link to order phone (1).

Full payment will be made then, and the £20 deposit will be deducted from the final price. Make sure you confirm the order within 14 days.

settings.heading: STEP 3: Receive phone (1)
settings.text: Receive phone (1) and the exclusive reward earlier than the general release.

settings.question: Why do I need to put down a non-refundable deposit?
settings.answer: phone (1) will have limited availability. This deposit confirms your commitment and ensures no one misses out.

settings.question: When can I order phone (1)?
settings.answer: On 12 July you’ll receive an email with an exclusive link, taking you to the phone (1) order page. You can select the model and pay the remaining price of the phone, minus the deposit. The order limit is one phone per person.

settings.question: What is the exclusive pre-order reward?
settings.answer: Complete your order within 14 days to get phone (1) before it officially goes on sale, to benefit from £20 credit to use towards a selected phone (1) accessory and ear (1).

settings.question: How do I move up the waitlist?
settings.answer: Invite your friends to join the waitlist by sending them an exclusive referral link in your account. When they register, you’ll move up the queue. The more people you refer, the more you move up.

settings.question: How long do I have to wait in the queue?
settings.answer: Pre-order availability is limited, so please be patient. We’re trying to ensure as many people get a spot as possible.

settings.question: What do I do once I get the invite code?
settings.answer: Come back to this page, click on ‘I have an invite code’ and enter it there. If you’ve already made an account, you can enter your details and pay the non-refundable £20 deposit. If you haven’t made an account yet, it’ll take you to create one. Just remember, this is just for confirming your details and paying the deposit, and not the actual order of phone (1).

settings.question: Why do I need to create an Account?
settings.answer: Access your orders and invite codes in one place.

settings.question: How do I pre-order if I live in India?
settings.answer: To pre-order, please visit in.nothing.tech. Orders will be fulfilled by Flipkart.

settings.question: When should I make the remaining payment for phone (1)?
settings.answer: 12 July, 2022, 9 PM onwards you will have to login on Flipkart to make the remaining payment.

settings.question: What is the final price of phone (1)?
settings.answer: The final price will be revealed on 12 July, 9 PM onwards.

settings.question: Who will fulfil my phone (1) order?
settings.answer: Your order will be fulfilled by Flipkart in India.
